## Traveling to Honolulu
Book flights to  Daniel K. Inouye International Airport (HNL). The Bus and rideshare pickups are available outside the airport.


## Living in Honolulu
Facebook Marketplace and Craigslist are typically the easiest sources to find short-term rentals on island.

## Transportation

The IRC shuttle provides service from the Ford Island gate and runs from 6-9AM and 3-6PM.

![](images/ShuttleMap.png){fig-align="center, width=500}

The Bus provides service across Oahu and is the cheapest way to get around the island. 

-   [The Bus routes and timetables](https://www.thebus.org/route/routes.asp){.external target="_blank"}
-   [Oahu Bus Iphone App](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/dabus2-the-oahu-bus-app/id1117179614){.external target="_blank"}

If you choose to ship a car from the mainland to Oahu, prices typically range around $1500. [Matson](https://www.matson.com/ship-your-car-with-matson-2.html?utm_source=google&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=mvnp-peregrine-search&utm_content=pov-shipping&gad_source=1&gclid=CjwKCAjwvr--BhB5EiwAd5YbXnd1ecnY8BBV-aKd0NKJfYNSshvz-ZM18nmB_IBAne9V_ov5kj6-VBoCmzwQAvD_BwE){.external target="_blank"} and [Pasha Hawaii](https://www.pashahawaii.com/quote-car?gad_source=1&gclid=CjwKCAjwvr--BhB5EiwAd5YbXgstnYB0IUtpGaVneMxZFPgn7UlHc0ki-NRikLftIPzNHWZGH1SPmhoCqBYQAvD_BwE) are two companies that provide car shipping services.
